tasks.title: Configure project infrastructure and design system
tasks.description: Set up core project infrastructure including SEO metadata, analytics, performance monitoring, design tokens and Tailwind configuration for the B2B humanoid robot leasing landing page
tasks.details:
1. Update next.config.ts with image optimization, security headers (CSP, CORS), and performance settings
2. Configure metadata in layout.tsx with proper SEO tags, Open Graph, and Twitter cards
3. Set up design system with brand colors (#0066FF primary, #00CC66 secondary), typography (Inter font), spacing, and component tokens
4. Install and configure required dependencies: framer-motion for animations, react-hook-form with zod for forms, Google Analytics 4, and Hotjar
5. Set up Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, breakpoints (mobile: 320-767px, tablet: 768-1023px, desktop: 1024px+)
6. Create base layout structure with responsive navigation and footer components
tasks.testStrategy: Verify Lighthouse scores >90 on all metrics, test responsive breakpoints, validate SEO meta tags with Google's Rich Results Test, ensure analytics events fire correctly, test CSP headers don't block required resources

subtasks.title: Install dependencies and configure Next.js with security headers
subtasks.description: Install required npm packages including framer-motion, react-hook-form, zod, and analytics packages. Update next.config.ts with image optimization settings, security headers (CSP, CORS, X-Frame-Options), and performance optimizations.
subtasks.details: Run npm install for framer-motion @5.20.x, react-hook-form @7.x, zod @3.x, @vercel/analytics, and their type definitions. Configure next.config.ts with images.domains for robot images, security headers middleware including CSP for analytics scripts, CORS for API endpoints, and cache control headers. Enable experimental features for optimized builds.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all packages install without peer dependency warnings, test security headers with curl commands, ensure CSP allows Google Analytics and Hotjar scripts

subtasks.title: Set up SEO metadata and Open Graph tags in layout.tsx
subtasks.description: Configure comprehensive SEO metadata in the root layout including Open Graph tags, Twitter cards, canonical URLs, and structured data for B2B humanoid robot leasing service.
subtasks.details: Update layout.tsx metadata with title 'Humanoid Robot Leasing - Deploy in Weeks | RobotDeploy', description focused on B2B value proposition, Open Graph tags with proper image dimensions (1200x630), Twitter card configuration, viewport settings for responsive design, and robots.txt directives. Add JSON-LD structured data for Organization and Service schema types.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate with Google's Rich Results Test, check Open Graph debugger, verify Twitter card validator passes, test meta tags render correctly in view-source

subtasks.title: Configure Tailwind CSS with custom design tokens
subtasks.description: Create Tailwind configuration file with brand colors, typography system using Inter font, responsive breakpoints, and component-level design tokens for consistent styling.
subtasks.details: Create tailwind.config.ts with custom color palette (primary: #0066FF, secondary: #00CC66, grays, error/success states), configure Inter font with font-display swap, set breakpoints (mobile: 320-767px, tablet: 768-1023px, desktop: 1024px+), add spacing scale and shadow utilities. Update globals.css with CSS custom properties for dynamic theming.
subtasks.testStrategy: Build CSS and verify custom classes generate correctly, test color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards, validate responsive utilities work at all breakpoints

subtasks.title: Implement analytics tracking with Google Analytics 4 and Hotjar
subtasks.description: Set up Google Analytics 4 with custom events for ROI calculator usage, demo bookings, and user interactions. Configure Hotjar for heatmaps and session recordings with privacy compliance.
subtasks.details: Create analytics utility module with GA4 gtag implementation, configure custom events for CTA clicks, calculator interactions, video plays, and form submissions. Set up Hotjar tracking code with proper consent management. Implement analytics context provider for centralized event tracking. Add environment variables for GA_MEASUREMENT_ID and HOTJAR_ID in .env.local.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use GA4 DebugView to verify events fire correctly, test Hotjar recording triggers, ensure analytics scripts don't block page load, verify GDPR consent flow works

subtasks.title: Create responsive layout components with navigation and footer
subtasks.description: Build reusable layout components including sticky navigation header with mobile menu, footer with company links and trust badges, and responsive container components for consistent page structure.
subtasks.details: Create Header component with logo, navigation links (Solutions, ROI Calculator, About, Contact), mobile hamburger menu with slide-out drawer, and sticky scroll behavior. Build Footer component with company info, legal links, certification badges, and newsletter signup. Implement Container and Section wrapper components with proper max-widths and padding for responsive layouts.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test mobile menu functionality on touch devices, verify sticky header performance, check accessibility with keyboard navigation, validate footer links and form submissions

tasks.title: Implement Hero section with video background and CTAs
tasks.description: Create the above-fold Hero section with autoplay video background, compelling headline/subheadline, dual CTAs (ROI Calculator and Book Demo), and trust indicators
tasks.details:
1. Create HeroSection component with 100vh height and responsive layout
2. Implement video background with muted autoplay (15-30 sec loop), fallback image for mobile/slow connections
3. Add headline 'Deploy Humanoid Robots in Weeks, Not Years—No Capital Required' with proper typography hierarchy
4. Create dual CTA buttons with hover animations: 'Calculate Your ROI' (primary) and 'Book Live Demo' (secondary)
5. Add trust indicators: customer logos carousel (4-6 brands), certification badges, '47 facilities across 8 countries' social proof
6. Ensure contrast ratio 4.5:1 minimum, optimize video file size <5MB, implement lazy loading
tasks.testStrategy: Test video autoplay on mobile browsers, verify CTA click tracking, validate accessibility with screen readers, test fallback image loading, ensure 3-second comprehension of value proposition, A/B test headline variations

subtasks.title: Create HeroSection component structure with responsive layout
subtasks.description: Build the main HeroSection React component with 100vh height, responsive grid layout, and proper container structure for video background and content overlay
subtasks.details: Create src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx with a main container using Tailwind classes for full viewport height (min-h-screen), relative positioning for video layering, and responsive breakpoints. Set up the component structure with sections for video background layer, content overlay layer with proper z-index management, and container for headline, CTAs, and trust indicators
subtasks.testStrategy: Test component renders at 100vh on desktop and mobile viewports, verify responsive breakpoints at sm/md/lg/xl, ensure proper z-index stacking of video and content layers

subtasks.title: Implement video background with fallback image support
subtasks.description: Add autoplay video background functionality with muted loop playback, mobile detection, and fallback image for slow connections or unsupported browsers
subtasks.details: Add video element with autoplay, muted, loop, and playsinline attributes in HeroSection. Implement useEffect hook to detect mobile/slow connections and conditionally render video or static image. Create VideoBackground component that handles video loading states, error handling, and automatic fallback to poster image. Ensure video file is optimized to under 5MB and implements lazy loading with Intersection Observer API
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify video autoplay works on Chrome, Safari, Firefox desktop and mobile, test fallback image loads on mobile devices, measure video file size and loading performance, validate muted autoplay policy compliance

subtasks.title: Add headline, subheadline and typography hierarchy
subtasks.description: Implement the main headline 'Deploy Humanoid Robots in Weeks, Not Years—No Capital Required' with proper typography scale, responsive text sizes, and semantic HTML structure
subtasks.details: Add h1 element with the main headline using Tailwind typography classes for proper font sizes (text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl). Implement subheadline as h2 with supporting text. Use font-bold for headline, appropriate line-height and letter-spacing. Ensure text has sufficient contrast against video background using text-white with background overlay or text shadow. Apply the Geist font family from layout.tsx
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate WCAG AAA contrast ratio of 4.5:1 minimum using Chrome DevTools, test text readability at different viewport sizes, verify semantic HTML structure with screen readers

subtasks.title: Create dual CTA buttons with animations
subtasks.description: Build primary 'Calculate Your ROI' and secondary 'Book Live Demo' call-to-action buttons with hover animations, proper styling hierarchy, and click tracking setup
subtasks.details: Create CTAButton component accepting variant prop (primary/secondary). Primary button uses solid background with hover scale and shadow effects, secondary uses outline style. Implement smooth transitions using Tailwind's transition classes and transform on hover. Add onClick handlers with console tracking for analytics integration. Position buttons using flex gap-4 layout, ensure touch-friendly sizes (min 44px height) and proper focus states for accessibility
subtasks.testStrategy: Test hover animations on desktop, verify touch interactions on mobile, validate button click tracking logs, ensure keyboard navigation and focus states work properly

subtasks.title: Add trust indicators section with logos and social proof
subtasks.description: Implement customer logos carousel, certification badges, and the '47 facilities across 8 countries' social proof text with proper layout and animations
subtasks.details: Create TrustIndicators component with three sections: customer logos (4-6 placeholder brand images in horizontal scroll/carousel), certification badges row, and social proof text. Use CSS Grid or Flexbox for responsive layout. Add subtle fade-in animations using Tailwind animate classes or Framer Motion if needed. Include placeholder images in public/images/logos/ and public/images/certifications/. Ensure logos are optimized SVGs or WebP format
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify carousel functionality on mobile swipe and desktop, test image lazy loading and format optimization, validate accessibility of carousel controls, measure total section load time

tasks.title: Build interactive ROI calculator with real-time results
tasks.description: Develop the client-side ROI calculator that enables self-qualification and demonstrates value with industry-specific inputs and real-time calculation outputs
tasks.details:
1. Create ROICalculator component with sticky sidebar/modal behavior
2. Implement inputs: industry dropdown, workers slider (1-50), hourly wage input ($15-$50), shift structure radio, overtime percentage slider
3. Build calculation logic: annual labor cost, robot leasing cost (€2,500/month base), net savings projections (1, 3, 5 years), payback period
4. Add real-time result updates with smooth number animations
5. Implement result actions: 'Download Full ROI Report' with lead capture, 'Discuss Your Results' CTA
6. Store calculator state in localStorage for persistence, add input validation and error handling
7. Display assumptions clearly (98% uptime, 15% productivity gain)
tasks.testStrategy: Validate calculation accuracy against spreadsheet model, test edge cases and input validation, verify localStorage persistence, test mobile slider usability, track calculator completion rate >70%, ensure <100ms calculation response time

subtasks.title: Create ROICalculator component structure with TypeScript interfaces
subtasks.description: Design and implement the main ROICalculator React component with proper TypeScript types for calculator inputs, outputs, and state management. Set up the component hierarchy with clear separation between UI and logic.
subtasks.details: Create src/components/roi-calculator/ROICalculator.tsx with TypeScript interfaces for CalculatorInputs (industry, workers, hourlyWage, shiftStructure, overtimePercentage) and CalculatorResults (annualLaborCost, robotLeasingCost, netSavings1Year, netSavings3Years, netSavings5Years, paybackPeriod). Implement useState hooks for form state and useEffect for localStorage persistence. Structure component with clear sections for inputs panel and results display.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit test TypeScript types compilation, verify component renders without errors, test prop passing and state management hooks

subtasks.title: Build calculator input controls with validation
subtasks.description: Implement all interactive input controls including industry dropdown, workers slider, hourly wage input, shift structure radio buttons, and overtime percentage slider with proper validation and error handling.
subtasks.details: Create reusable input components: IndustryDropdown with options (Manufacturing, Warehousing, Logistics, Automotive, Food Processing), WorkersSlider (range 1-50 with visual markers), HourlyWageInput ($15-$50 with currency formatting), ShiftStructureRadio (1-shift, 2-shift, 3-shift options), OvertimeSlider (0-40% range). Add input validation with error messages, implement debounced onChange handlers to prevent excessive recalculation, use Tailwind CSS for styling consistent with Next.js defaults.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test input validation boundaries, verify error message display, test keyboard navigation and accessibility, validate debounce timing

subtasks.title: Implement ROI calculation engine with business logic
subtasks.description: Create the core calculation logic that computes annual labor costs, robot leasing costs, net savings projections for multiple timeframes, and payback period based on industry-specific parameters and assumptions.
subtasks.details: Implement calculateROI function with formulas: annualLaborCost = workers * hourlyWage * hoursPerYear * (1 + overtimeMultiplier), robotLeasingCost = €2,500/month * 12 * robotsNeeded, productivity gain = 15%, uptime = 98%. Calculate net savings for 1/3/5 year periods accounting for compounding benefits. Determine payback period using cumulative savings vs initial investment. Add industry-specific multipliers for different sectors. Export calculation functions for testing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate calculations against spreadsheet model, test edge cases (0 workers, max values), verify currency conversions EUR/USD, test industry multipliers

subtasks.title: Create animated results display with smooth transitions
subtasks.description: Build the results panel that displays calculated ROI metrics with smooth number animations, visual charts, and clear presentation of assumptions to build trust and transparency.
subtasks.details: Implement ResultsDisplay component with animated number counters using requestAnimationFrame for smooth transitions. Display metrics: Total Annual Savings, 1/3/5 Year Net Savings, Payback Period (in months), ROI Percentage. Add visual progress bars or simple charts for savings over time. Include AssumptionsPanel showing 98% uptime, 15% productivity gain, maintenance included. Use CSS transitions for panel appearance, implement loading state during calculation. Format large numbers with thousand separators and currency symbols.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test animation performance on mobile devices, verify number formatting accuracy, test smooth transitions between calculations, validate accessibility of animated content

subtasks.title: Add lead capture CTAs and modal behavior
subtasks.description: Implement sticky/modal positioning for the calculator, add download ROI report and contact sales CTAs with proper tracking, and integrate with localStorage for state persistence across sessions.
subtasks.details: Implement sticky sidebar behavior on desktop (position: sticky) and modal overlay on mobile with proper z-index management. Add 'Download Full ROI Report' button that triggers lead capture modal before PDF generation. Add 'Discuss Your Results' CTA button linking to contact form with pre-filled calculator data. Implement localStorage persistence to save/restore calculator state on page reload. Add analytics event tracking for calculator interactions (inputs changed, results viewed, CTAs clicked). Handle modal accessibility with focus trap and ESC key handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test sticky positioning across viewport sizes, verify localStorage data persistence and retrieval, test modal accessibility and keyboard navigation, validate analytics events fire correctly

tasks.title: Create Problem Statement and Solution Overview sections
tasks.description: Build sections that articulate customer pain points (labor shortage, rising costs, safety) and introduce humanoid robots as the solution with capabilities showcase
tasks.details:
1. Create ProblemSection with 3-column grid layout: Labor Shortage (73% hiring difficulty stat), Rising Costs (22% wage increase), Safety (2.7M injuries/year)
2. Add icons, statistics with sources (Bureau of Labor Statistics, OSHA), and descriptive text for each problem
3. Build SolutionSection with value proposition grid: Deploy Fast (2-4 weeks), Zero CapEx (€2,500/month), Human-Compatible, 24/7 Operations
4. Create interactive tabs/cards for robot capabilities: Material Handling, Assembly, Quality Control, Machine Tending
5. Add video/GIF demos (5-10 sec) for each use case with ROI timeline and specs
6. Implement expandable technical specs accordion: payload 10-25kg, reach 1.8m, ±1mm precision, ISO 10218 compliant
tasks.testStrategy: Track engagement with capability tabs, test accordion accessibility, verify video loading performance, validate statistics sources, A/B test problem/solution messaging order, ensure mobile-friendly grid layout

subtasks.title: Create ProblemSection component with 3-column grid layout
subtasks.description: Build the ProblemSection component in src/components/sections/ProblemSection.tsx with a responsive 3-column grid layout displaying labor shortage, rising costs, and safety statistics
subtasks.details: Create ProblemSection.tsx component using Tailwind's grid system. Implement responsive design with grid-cols-1 on mobile, grid-cols-3 on desktop. Each column should display: Labor Shortage (73% hiring difficulty), Rising Costs (22% wage increase), Safety (2.7M injuries/year). Include proper TypeScript types and ensure component follows Next.js 15 patterns with proper imports from the existing codebase structure.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify responsive grid layout on different screen sizes, validate statistics display correctly, test accessibility with screen readers, ensure proper semantic HTML structure

subtasks.title: Add icons, statistics, and source citations to ProblemSection
subtasks.description: Enhance ProblemSection with visual icons, formatted statistics with source citations from Bureau of Labor Statistics and OSHA, and descriptive text for each problem
subtasks.details: Install and configure an icon library (lucide-react or heroicons). Add appropriate icons for each problem category. Format statistics with proper typography using Tailwind classes. Include small citation text linking to Bureau of Labor Statistics for labor/cost data and OSHA for safety statistics. Add descriptive paragraphs explaining each pain point with proper text hierarchy and spacing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify icon rendering and accessibility attributes, validate external links to citation sources work correctly, test text readability and contrast ratios

subtasks.title: Build SolutionSection with value proposition grid
subtasks.description: Create SolutionSection component displaying four key value propositions: Deploy Fast, Zero CapEx, Human-Compatible, and 24/7 Operations in an engaging grid layout
subtasks.details: Create src/components/sections/SolutionSection.tsx with a 2x2 grid on desktop, single column on mobile. Each value prop card should include: Deploy Fast (2-4 weeks timeline), Zero CapEx (€2,500/month leasing), Human-Compatible (no infrastructure changes), 24/7 Operations (continuous productivity). Use consistent card styling with hover effects and proper spacing. Implement with TypeScript and ensure proper component composition.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test grid responsiveness across breakpoints, verify card hover interactions, validate content hierarchy and readability, ensure consistent spacing and alignment

subtasks.title: Create interactive capability tabs with demos
subtasks.description: Implement interactive tabs/cards showcasing robot capabilities for Material Handling, Assembly, Quality Control, and Machine Tending with video/GIF demonstrations
subtasks.details: Build a tabs component using React state management for tab switching. Each tab should display: capability title, 5-10 second video/GIF demo (use Next.js Image component for GIFs or video tag for mp4), description of the use case, ROI timeline, and key specifications. Implement smooth transitions between tabs using CSS transitions. Create placeholder content for demos initially. Ensure keyboard navigation support for accessibility.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test tab switching functionality and keyboard navigation, verify video/GIF loading performance, measure interaction metrics, validate mobile touch interactions

subtasks.title: Implement expandable technical specifications accordion
subtasks.description: Add an expandable accordion component displaying detailed technical specifications including payload capacity, reach, precision, and compliance certifications
subtasks.details: Create an accordion component within SolutionSection showing technical specs: Payload (10-25kg), Reach (1.8m), Precision (±1mm), ISO 10218 compliance, and other relevant specifications. Use React state for expand/collapse functionality with smooth height transitions. Include proper ARIA attributes for accessibility. Style with consistent design tokens and ensure smooth animations. Position below the capability tabs for logical information hierarchy.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test accordion expand/collapse functionality, verify smooth animations performance, validate keyboard accessibility, ensure content remains readable when expanded on mobile devices

tasks.title: Implement How It Works process timeline
tasks.description: Create the 4-step deployment process visualization showing the journey from inquiry to production with clear timelines and deliverables
tasks.details:
1. Build ProcessTimeline component with horizontal layout (desktop) and vertical (mobile)
2. Create 4 steps: Discovery Call (Week 1), Proof of Concept (Week 2-3), Deployment (Week 4-6), Optimization & Support (Ongoing)
3. Add icons, descriptions, and deliverables for each step
4. Implement progress indicator showing 6-week typical timeline
5. Make each step expandable for detailed information
6. Add 'Start Your Journey' CTA at section end
7. Use Framer Motion for smooth step-by-step reveal animations on scroll
tasks.testStrategy: Test timeline responsiveness across devices, verify expandable content accessibility, track CTA conversion from this section, test animation performance, ensure clear visual progression flow

subtasks.title: Create ProcessTimeline component structure with responsive layout
subtasks.description: Build the base ProcessTimeline component with responsive container that switches between horizontal (desktop) and vertical (mobile) layouts using CSS Grid or Flexbox
subtasks.details: Create components/ProcessTimeline.tsx with responsive breakpoints at 768px. Use CSS Grid for desktop horizontal layout and switch to vertical stack on mobile. Set up container with proper padding and max-width constraints. Import and configure Framer Motion for animations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test responsive behavior at multiple breakpoints (320px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px). Verify layout switches correctly between horizontal and vertical. Test container padding and spacing on different screen sizes.

subtasks.title: Design and implement the 4-step process cards with icons
subtasks.description: Create individual step cards for Discovery Call, Proof of Concept, Deployment, and Optimization & Support with custom icons, titles, week ranges, and descriptions
subtasks.details: Build ProcessStep component accepting step data (title, weekRange, description, deliverables, icon). Use Heroicons or custom SVGs for step icons. Structure each card with consistent styling including borders, shadows, and hover states. Implement color coding or numbering system for visual progression.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all 4 cards render with correct content. Test icon loading and fallbacks. Check card hover states and interactions. Validate text truncation and overflow handling.

subtasks.title: Add expandable details and deliverables for each step
subtasks.description: Implement accordion-style expandable sections within each process step card to show detailed information and deliverables list when clicked
subtasks.details: Use Radix UI Accordion or build custom expandable component with useState. Add smooth height transitions for expand/collapse. Include deliverables as bulleted lists in expanded view. Implement chevron icons that rotate on expand. Ensure only one step can be expanded at a time for clarity.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test accordion keyboard navigation (Space/Enter to toggle). Verify smooth expand/collapse animations. Check accessibility with screen readers. Test single vs multiple expansion behavior.

subtasks.title: Build visual progress indicator showing 6-week timeline
subtasks.description: Create a horizontal progress bar or timeline visualization that displays the 6-week typical deployment timeline with week markers and current phase highlighting
subtasks.details: Implement ProgressIndicator component with SVG or CSS for the timeline bar. Add week markers at positions corresponding to each phase duration. Use different colors or patterns to distinguish phases. Add animated fill effect on scroll using Intersection Observer. Include total duration label '6 weeks typical timeline'.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify timeline displays correct week ranges for each phase. Test progress animation triggers on scroll. Check visual clarity of phase distinctions. Validate responsive scaling of timeline.

subtasks.title: Implement scroll-triggered animations and Start Journey CTA
subtasks.description: Add Framer Motion scroll animations for step-by-step reveal and create prominent Call-to-Action button at section end linking to contact or demo booking
subtasks.details: Configure Framer Motion's whileInView for staggered step animations with 0.2s delays between cards. Set up viewport detection with threshold of 0.3. Create StartJourneyCTA component with primary button styling matching site theme. Position CTA below timeline with proper spacing. Add hover and click animations to CTA button.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test animation performance on low-end devices. Verify animations trigger at correct scroll positions. Track CTA click events and conversion rate. Check animation accessibility settings respect prefers-reduced-motion.

tasks.title: Build Case Studies section with social proof

subtasks.title: Implement 3 featured case studies with real customer success data
subtasks.description: Create the three featured case studies (Automotive, E-commerce, Electronics) with their specific metrics, challenges, solutions, and visual assets integrated into the CaseStudyCard components
subtasks.details: Implement automotive case study with 35% throughput increase and $640K savings, e-commerce with 99.7% accuracy and 50% cost reduction, electronics with 0.3% defects and 40% faster ramp-up. Create data structures in src/data/caseStudies.ts with complete details for each case. Add placeholder images for before/after photos, embed video URLs, and create ROI graph data for each case study with realistic metrics visualization
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all metrics display correctly, test image and video loading, validate data accuracy against requirements, ensure proper formatting of financial figures

subtasks.title: Build rotating customer logos carousel with smooth animations
subtasks.description: Create a smooth, accessible carousel component that displays 15-20 customer company logos with automatic rotation and manual navigation controls
subtasks.details: Build src/components/CustomerLogosCarousel.tsx using Framer Motion for smooth animations. Implement auto-play with pause on hover, manual navigation arrows, keyboard navigation support, and touch/swipe gestures for mobile. Display 4-5 logos at a time on desktop, 2-3 on tablet, 1-2 on mobile. Add proper ARIA labels and ensure logos are optimized SVGs or WebP images. Include continuous loop functionality with seamless transitions
subtasks.testStrategy: Test carousel on various devices and screen sizes, verify keyboard navigation, test auto-play pause/resume, validate touch gestures on mobile, check performance with 20 logos

subtasks.title: Create aggregate statistics component with animated number counters
subtasks.description: Build a visually impressive statistics display showing 47 facilities, 180+ robots deployed, 99.2% uptime, and $24M in total savings with animated number counting effects
subtasks.details: Create src/components/AggregateStats.tsx with animated number counters using Framer Motion or React CountUp. Add subtle icons for each metric and use brand colors for emphasis. Ensure numbers animate smoothly from 0 to final value over 2-3 seconds with easing functions
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify animation triggers on scroll, test number formatting with large values, validate performance with multiple animations, ensure accessibility for screen readers

subtasks.title: Assemble complete CaseStudies section with awards badges and library link

subtasks.title: Build pricing comparison table with feature matrix

subtasks.details: Create src/app/components/PricingComparison.tsx with a responsive table showing feature availability across tiers. subtasks.details: Create src/app/components/FleetManagement.tsx with a hero section containing dashboard preview image/mockup. subtasks.title: Integrate video walkthrough and interactive demo elements
subtasks.description: Add video embed component for platform walkthrough and create interactive demo elements or call-to-action buttons for deeper engagement with the fleet management platform
subtasks.details: Create src/app/components/VideoWalkthrough.tsx for embedding a 2-3 minute platform walkthrough video with proper loading states and controls. subtasks.title: Create FAQ data structure and Accordion base component

subtasks.details: Create src/data/faqData.ts with typed FAQ structure including categories like deployment (time, process), facility requirements, financial (leasing vs buying, ROI), safety concerns, training needs, scaling options, and data security. Build src/components/ui/Accordion.tsx with proper ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation (arrow keys, enter/space), and smooth expand/collapse animations using CSS transitions. Add section heading 'Frequently Asked Questions' with subtitle about addressing common concerns. Style accordion items with hover states, active states, and smooth transitions. Implement expand all/collapse all functionality if beneficial for UX. Use Tailwind classes for consistent styling matching the landing page design system.

tasks.title: Develop lead capture forms and CRM integration
tasks.description: Create conversion-optimized forms for demo requests, ROI report downloads, and contact inquiries with proper validation and CRM integration
tasks.details:
1. Build reusable Form components using react-hook-form and zod validation
2. Create forms: Demo Request (calendar integration), ROI Report Download, Contact Sales, Newsletter Signup
3. Implement server-side form handling with rate limiting (5 submissions/hour per IP)
4. Add reCAPTCHA v3 for spam prevention (invisible)
5. Integrate with HubSpot/Salesforce CRM API for automatic lead sync within 5 minutes
6. Implement lead scoring algorithm (0-100) based on company size, industry, engagement
7. Add email verification for downloads and confirmation messaging
8. Create thank you pages with next steps and additional resources
tasks.testStrategy: Test form validation rules, verify CRM data sync accuracy, test CAPTCHA integration, validate rate limiting, track form conversion rates >10%, test email delivery and formatting, ensure GDPR compliance

subtasks.title: Set up form infrastructure with react-hook-form and zod validation
subtasks.description: Install and configure react-hook-form, zod, and @hookform/resolvers for form validation. Create reusable form components including Input, Select, and Textarea with proper TypeScript types and error handling.
subtasks.details: Install dependencies: npm install react-hook-form zod @hookform/resolvers. Create components/forms directory structure with BaseInput.tsx, BaseSelect.tsx, BaseTextarea.tsx components that integrate with react-hook-form's Controller. Set up common validation schemas in lib/validations/forms.ts including email, phone, and company validation rules. Create FormProvider wrapper component for shared form context.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for each form component validating error states, accessibility attributes, and form control registration. Test validation schemas with valid and invalid inputs.

subtasks.title: Build lead capture forms UI components
subtasks.description: Create four specific form components: Demo Request Form with calendar integration, ROI Report Download Form, Contact Sales Form, and Newsletter Signup Form with appropriate fields and layouts.
subtasks.details: Create components/forms/DemoRequestForm.tsx with fields: name, email, company, phone, preferred date/time (using react-datepicker). Create ROIReportForm.tsx with fields: name, email, company, industry, company size. Create ContactSalesForm.tsx with comprehensive fields including budget range and timeline. Create NewsletterForm.tsx with minimal email-only signup. Each form should use the base components and validation schemas from subtask 1.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test form submission flow, field validation on blur and submit, proper error message display, and accessibility compliance with screen readers.

subtasks.title: Implement server-side form handling with rate limiting
subtasks.description: Create API routes for form submissions with rate limiting middleware to prevent spam (5 submissions per hour per IP) and proper error handling.
subtasks.details: Create app/api/forms/[formType]/route.ts to handle different form types. Implement rate limiting using upstash/ratelimit or custom Redis-based solution tracking IP addresses. Add form submission logging to a database or file system. Implement server-side validation matching client-side rules. Return appropriate HTTP status codes and error messages. Store submissions temporarily before CRM sync.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test rate limiting with multiple rapid submissions from same IP, verify proper error responses, test server-side validation independently, ensure data persistence before CRM sync.

subtasks.title: Integrate reCAPTCHA v3 and CRM API connections
subtasks.description: Add invisible reCAPTCHA v3 for spam prevention and implement HubSpot/Salesforce CRM integration with automatic lead sync within 5 minutes of submission.
subtasks.details: Install @google/recaptcha-enterprise or react-google-recaptcha-v3. Configure reCAPTCHA in forms with score threshold validation (0.5 minimum). Create lib/crm/hubspot.ts and lib/crm/salesforce.ts with API client setup. Implement lead creation/update logic with proper field mapping. Add background job using Next.js API routes or Vercel Cron for syncing leads every 5 minutes. Handle API failures with retry logic and error notifications.
subtasks.testStrategy: Mock CRM API responses for testing, verify lead data mapping accuracy, test retry logic for failed API calls, validate reCAPTCHA score filtering.

subtasks.title: Create lead scoring system and thank you pages
subtasks.description: Implement lead scoring algorithm (0-100) based on company size, industry, and engagement. Build dynamic thank you pages with next steps and email confirmation system.
subtasks.details: Create lib/scoring/leadScoring.ts with algorithm weighing: company size (30%), industry match (25%), budget (25%), timeline (20%). Score leads immediately upon submission. Create app/thank-you/[formType]/page.tsx with dynamic content based on form type and lead score. Implement email verification using SendGrid or Resend API for download links. Create email templates for confirmations with personalized content. Add tracking pixels for email open rates.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test lead scoring with various input combinations, verify score ranges (0-100), test email delivery and formatting, validate thank you page routing and content display.

tasks.title: Optimize performance, SEO, and launch preparation
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive performance optimizations, SEO enhancements, analytics setup, and conduct thorough testing for production launch
tasks.details:
1. Optimize images: convert to WebP/AVIF, implement responsive images, lazy loading with intersection observer
2. Configure SEO: meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter cards, schema.org markup (Organization, Product, FAQPage)
3. Generate XML sitemap, configure robots.txt, submit to Google Search Console
4. Set up Google Analytics 4 with custom events: ROI calculator usage, video engagement, form submissions
5. Implement Hotjar for heatmaps and session recordings
6. Configure CDN (CloudFront/Cloudflare) with proper cache headers
7. Run Lighthouse audits and optimize for >90 scores on all metrics
8. Conduct accessibility audit (WCAG 2.1 AA) and cross-browser testing
9. Set up error tracking with Sentry, implement 404 and error pages
10. Create staging environment for final UAT and prepare deployment pipeline

subtasks.title: Configure Next.js image optimization and implement responsive media handling

Replace all img tags with Next.js Image component, implement responsive srcsets for different viewport sizes. Add blur placeholder generation for above-fold images. Configure intersection observer for lazy loading below-fold images and videos. Set up image optimization API routes if needed for dynamic image transformation
subtasks.testStrategy: Run Lighthouse performance audits to verify image optimization improvements, test lazy loading behavior by scrolling through pages, verify WebP/AVIF fallbacks work correctly, measure Core Web Vitals improvements

subtasks.title: Implement comprehensive SEO metadata and structured data markup
subtasks.description: Configure all SEO metadata including meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, and implement schema.org structured data for Organization, Product, and FAQPage schemas with proper JSON-LD formatting
subtasks.details: Update layout.tsx and create generateMetadata functions for dynamic pages with title, description, canonical URLs. Implement Open Graph tags for social media sharing with proper image specifications. Add Twitter Card metadata for enhanced Twitter sharing. Create JSON-LD structured data components for Organization schema with company details, Product schema for robot offerings, and FAQPage schema for the FAQ section. Ensure all metadata is dynamically generated based on page content
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate structured data using Google's Rich Results Test tool, test social media previews using Facebook and Twitter debuggers, verify meta tags using SEO testing tools, ensure proper rendering in search results preview

subtasks.title: Set up analytics tracking with Google Analytics 4 and user behavior monitoring
subtasks.description: Implement Google Analytics 4 with custom event tracking for ROI calculator usage, video engagement, and form submissions, plus integrate Hotjar for heatmaps and session recordings to understand user behavior
subtasks.details: Install and configure Google Analytics 4 using gtag or next/third-parties package. Create custom events for ROI calculator interactions (start, complete, download), video engagement metrics (play, pause, completion percentage), form submissions and CTA clicks. Set up conversion goals for demo bookings and ROI report downloads. Integrate Hotjar script for heatmap generation and session recording. Configure privacy-compliant cookie consent banner with opt-in analytics tracking
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify GA4 events fire correctly using Google Analytics DebugView, test Hotjar recording triggers and heatmap data collection, validate cookie consent functionality, ensure GDPR compliance for EU visitors

subtasks.title: Generate sitemap, configure robots.txt, and set up search console integration
subtasks.description: Create dynamic XML sitemap generation for all pages, configure robots.txt with proper crawl directives, implement 404 and error pages, and prepare for Google Search Console submission
subtasks.details: Implement next-sitemap package for automatic sitemap.xml generation with proper priority and changefreq values. Configure robots.txt in public folder with crawl directives and sitemap reference. Create custom 404.tsx and error.tsx pages with helpful navigation and branding. Generate and verify site ownership files for Google Search Console. Set up automatic sitemap submission on build. Configure URL structure for clean, SEO-friendly paths
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate sitemap XML format and all URLs return 200 status, test robots.txt serves correctly and follows directives, verify 404 page displays for invalid routes, confirm Search Console ownership verification

subtasks.title: Configure CDN, implement performance monitoring, and prepare production deployment
subtasks.description: Set up CDN with CloudFront or Cloudflare for optimal content delivery, implement Sentry error tracking, configure staging environment, optimize build output, and ensure all performance targets are met for production launch
subtasks.details: Configure CDN with proper cache headers for static assets, implement cache-control strategies for different resource types. Install and configure Sentry for production error tracking with source maps. Set up staging environment variables and deployment pipeline. Run comprehensive Lighthouse audits targeting 90+ scores on all metrics. Conduct WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility audit using axe-core. Perform cross-browser testing on Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge. Configure security headers (CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options). Optimize bundle size with code splitting and tree shaking
subtasks.testStrategy: Run load tests with 1000+ concurrent users to verify CDN performance, validate Sentry error reporting in staging environment, achieve Lighthouse scores >90 on all metrics, pass automated accessibility tests, verify cross-browser compatibility
